name: Junkmania
description:
In a post-apocalyptic world where the only source of energy is useless junk, one little Junk Sorting Robot desperately joins together different pieces of scrap to create batteries that allow him to stay alive.

A fun little arcade-style panic game with the chill and smooth vibes that come from being out in the desert. 

Made by Joelzilla, SamB and Adam Wom over 48 hours for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam. Music by Lobo Loco.
